name: Wood Blight
desc: A small, nearly-humanoid creature of twisted roots and vines.
special:
* When this creature is defeated, deal 2 _Stab_ Damage in a _Burst_ 1 and make their space _Brambles_.
* This creature treats all _Wooden_ spaces as _Fortified_.

name: Vine Blight
desc: A wood spirit with a vaguely serpentine form comprised of vines.
special:
* When this creature is defeated its space becomes _Brush_.
* This creature treats all _Wooden_ spaces as _Fortified_.
* This creature has _Advantage_ on all attacks against a _Grabbed_ creature and Disadvatange against all others.

name: Seeder
desc: A wood spirit specializing in creating new spirits and explosive dangers.
special:
* When this creature is defeated its space becomes _Brush_.
* This creature treats all _Wooden_ spaces as _Fortified_.

name: Corrupted Bog Blight
desc: A water spirit full of mud and silt, corrupted by some unknown force. It has no real defined form, appearing as a risen mas of water.
special:
* At _Respite_ this creature may _Draw_ 1 from an adjacent space to gain 3 _Health_.
* When this creature is defeated its spaces become _Shallow Water_.
* Whenever a creature _Draws_ from a _Source_ contiguous with this creature they take 2 _Poison_ _Damage_. They may only take this Damage once per _Draw_.
* All _Water_ Attacks this creature makes deal +2 _Poison_ Damage.

name: Weeping Tree
desc: A tree of life that has been corrupted. It appears like a weeping willow, with the draped branches acting as legs, and a torso that is a cross between a crocodile and gorilla extending down like the trunk. Thick sap lines seem to constantly pour from its eyes, and its body is covered in a putrescent purple rot that shifts and slides about like a living mass.
special:
* This creature has an unlimited number of _Small Coils_.
* This creature has 3 Health Bars. Whenever it loses a Health Bar it immediately uses _Weep_ at no cost, its maximum _Stamina_ is decreased by 2, but it immediately gains 1 more _AP_.
* When _Defeated_ with no Health Bars remaining, roll a d6. If the roll is equal to or lower than the remaining number of Copper Nails, this creature dies.
